name: MayMayMator 2006
description:
Compete with friends to create the best memes!

MayMayMator is a meme generator. You can play the game as a local multiplayer game, or use it to make quick memes.

Instructions

  • There may be some issues with https links for images (imgur works fine though).
  • Strawpoll requires minimum 2 memes.


Updated to v1.3 - 2016-01-28

  • Added a font dropdown with Bold, Italic and Bold Italic options.
  • Potential fix for malformed urls.
  • Allow bigger text sizes.

Updated to v1.2 - 2016-01-27

  • Added sliders to resize top and bottom text (<3).
  • Application now uses resizable window (useful to zoom image or create desired black bars).
  • Codebase refactor to make things future proof (tl;dr; you don't care about this, but is goot).

Updated to v1.1 - 2016-01-25

  • Added Imgur upload directly from app (<3).
  • Fixed minor visual issues.
  • Allow multiline memes.
